Dr√∏set: Hi is that the customer center? You see, I have a problem with my card. Or the cards.
07 Nov 2019, 07:30 at H9



Gallery



üì∑ H√Çkon Mosvold Larsen / Scanpix Gallery


- I was in the store and the card didn't work. The pretty lady said it went out on October 31st. Of course it was the convenience store, which has seen me both in pajamas and without makeup, so I could pay with lashes. But then the lashes didn't work either, because my other card didn't work either. Fortunately, I had a third card. But the expired card shouldn't I have got a new one?
- Yes, and we sent that in the mail many weeks ago.
- But I have standing orders that you should never send me cards in the mail. There are so many thefts. I want to pick up my cards at the bank.
- Yeah yeah? I'll write it down here.
- Again. Write down again. I have been asking for this every year for many years. You only got it once.
- But do you say you did not receive the card we sent? Then we block it and order a new one. Like that. Then it was done.
- But the Visa card that I cut in two when I got the new one? Why doesn't the new card work? Not the credit card, which you also sent in the mail, even if you didn't, but the other.
- We only sent one card. You've cut the Visa card that expires next year.
...
Hello? Are you okay?
- Oi. Then I only have the credit card. For you have blocked the community card, which I thought was my card. By the way, it explains why there was so much money in my account and almost empty on the other ...
- Then we order a new Visa card. We will send you ...
- No. Don't send. DO NOT send.
- Yeah yeah? I'll write it down here ...
The day after. It is crease with the bus card. And the parking company. Both report that the card has expired. Although this was on the card, which is due to expire next year and existed virtually, even though it was cut physically, but which was now anyway in new order. Safe for the bank.
Then it ticks in a text message. "Hi. Then your bank card is on the way in the mail, so we hope you will be satisfied. You will normally receive the card within a week."
She murmurs. Then she goes into the kitchen drawer and finds cash.
